title: Small Business | L'Observateur
text: Preparing Your Car for Florida’s Hurricane Season with Cassels Garage Melbourne, United States - December 29, 2023 / Cassels Garage / In Florida, particularly in Melbourne, the hurricane season brings a unique set of challenges for vehicle owners. The season, marked by severe weather conditions including strong winds, heavy rain, and potential flooding, demands thorough preparedness to protect and maintain vehicles. Owners must be vigilant in ensuring their cars can withstand these harsh elements. Regular maintenance checks, understanding and preparing for the specific threats posed by hurricanes, and adopting proactive measures are crucial in safeguarding vehicles during this period. This preparedness is not just about immediate safety, but also about preserving the long-term integrity and functionality of vehicles in a climate that can be particularly taxing on automotive health. Let’s discuss the aspects of preparing for Florida’s Hurricane Season with Cassels Garage. Understanding Hurricane Season in Melbourne, FL The hurricane season in Florida, typically spanning from June to November, poses significant risks to vehicles. During this period, vehicles are frequently exposed to extreme weather conditions such as high winds, torrential rains, and the potential for severe flooding. These elements can lead to a range of issues from cosmetic damage to critical mechanical failures. The combination of strong winds and heavy rains can compromise visibility and vehicle control, while flooding poses a risk of water damage to engines and electrical systems, making it imperative for vehicle owners to take proactive measures to protect their cars. To read the full blog, [click here.](https://casselsgarage.com/uncategorized/preparing-your-car-for-floridas-hurricane-season-with-cassels-garage/) [](https://www.casselsgarage.com/) Contact Information: Cassels Garage 55 SW Irwin Ave Melbourne, FL 32904 United States Howard Fulton (321) 727-2111 [https://www.casselsgarage.com/](https://www.casselsgarage.com/)
